result.name: guardianship_under_the_mental_health_act_1983
result.notes: Information on the use of Guardianship under Section 7 and 37 of the Mental Health Act 1983, during the reporting period 1 April - 31 March each year. It contains information on new, continuing and closed cases at national, regional and local authority levels and includes breakdowns by gender, Guardianship type, and type of local authority.

odi-certificate.title: Guardianship under the Mental Health Act, 1983

organization.name: nhs-digital
organization.title: NHS Digital
organization.description:
NHS Digital is the national provider of information, data and IT systems for health and social care.

It was previously called 'The Health and Social Care Information Centre (HSCIC)'

result.title: Guardianship under the Mental Health Act, 1983
